Row.Text: Qajar Unique Food Building. +9 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Gold Buildings and Wonders. Ageless.
Qajar Unique Happiness Building. +9[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence Adjacency for Culture Buildings and Wonders. Ageless.

Qajar Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Ghahve Khane and Takyeh in the same District. +10% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in this Settlement when in a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
+10% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in this Settlement when in a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
+4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist Limit in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be built in Desert Terrain.
+1 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialist Limit in this Settlement.[N]Must be built in Desert Terrain.
The garden was clad in robes of spring, and the air was filled with sweet sounds of music and song.
